statements: SELECT name, expiration_date, quantity FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, quantity, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE restock_alert = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, name, restock_alert FROM perishable_ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE restock_alert = TRUE ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, name, quantity, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM perishable_ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date <= '2023-06-30' AND restock_alert = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, name, expiration_date FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT alert_message, ingredients.name FROM alerts JOIN ingredients ON alerts.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ingredient_id, name, expiration_date FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date IS NOT NULL AND expiration_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT i.name, i.quantity, a.alert_message FROM ingredients i LEFT JOIN alerts a ON i.ingredient_id = a.ingredient_id WHERE i.quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id IN (SELECT ingredient_id FROM alerts);
SELECT * FROM ingredients
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM ingredients
SELECT id, name FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM restocking_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC
SELECT restocked_quantity, restock_date FROM restocking_history WHERE ingredient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM ingredients WHERE expiration_date < '2023-03-15';
SELECT ingredient_id, SUM(restocked_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM restocking_history GROUP BY ingredient_id;
SELECT i.name, r.stock_quantity FROM ingredients i INNER JOIN restocking_alerts r ON i.id = r.ingredient_id WHERE r.stock_quantity < 100;
SELECT i.name, MAX(r.restock_date) AS last_restock_date FROM ingredients i LEFT JOIN restocking_history r ON i.id = r.ingredient_id GROUP BY r.ingredient_id ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient;
SELECT ingredient_name, expiration_date FROM ingredient;
SELECT ingredient_name, expiration_date FROM ingredient WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ingredient_stock ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient_stock JOIN ingredient ON ingredient_stock.ingredient_id = ingredient.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredient;
SELECT ingredient_name, expiration_date FROM ingredient WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT i.ingredient_name, s.quantity FROM ingredient AS i JOIN ingredient_stock AS s ON i.ingredient_id = s.ingredient_id WHERE s.quantity > 100;

SELECT rh.restock_date, rh.quantity_restocked, i.ingredient_name FROM restock_history AS rh JOIN ingredient_stock AS s ON rh.stock_id = s.stock_id JOIN ingredient AS i ON s.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;

SELECT i.ingredient_name, rs.alert_date FROM ingredient AS i JOIN ingredient_stock AS s ON i.ingredient_id = s.ingredient_id JOIN restock_alert AS rs ON s.stock_id = rs.stock_id WHERE rs.alert_date < '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM perishable_ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, expiration_date FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT * FROM perishable_ingredients WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT inventory_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY inventory_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT p.ingredient_id, p.purchase_date, h.quantity_purchased FROM perishable_ingredients p JOIN purchase_history h ON p.ingredient_id = h.ingredient_id;
SELECT restock_alerts.alert_id, r.alert_message, i.ingredient_name FROM restock_alerts INNER JOIN perishable_ingredients i ON r.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id ORDER BY r.alert_date DESC;
